_header: Eleven thousand of virgins for our Lord I-martyred were
Title(s): The Eleven Thousand Virgins; South English Legendary
Bibliographic Ghosts: Southwell, Southwell Cathedral Library 7, f. 172: prose.
_description: The Eleven Thousand Virgins, in the South English Legendary — in couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
Elleue þousend virgines þat vair companye wasImartred
                    were uor godes loue ichulle ȝou telle þat cas…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou god ous grante uor is grace þat we mote winneþe
                    heie Ioie of heuene þat þis maidens beþ Inne

Bod779.First Lines:
Ellewe þousen of maydenes þat a fayre compenye wasI
                    marterd weren for cristes loue & wole tellen þat
                    cas…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…nowȝ god vs graunty for his gras þat we moot
                    awinneþe hyȝe blisse of heuene þer þis maydenes
                    beþ inne
Bod779.Editions:
Schubel,  Friedrich,
                        ed.  
             Die südenglische Legende von den elftausend Jungfrauen.
Greifswalder Beiträge zur Literatur und Stilforschung
         21. Greifswald: Dallmeyer, 1928: 151.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
Endleuene þousend of virgines for ore louerd imartrede
                    wereTelle ichulle of heore martyrdom and ho heom þarto gan
                    lere…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Þis Abbod wende him hom aȝein with wel dreorie
                    chereNou god us graunti ȝif is wille is þat we moten i
                    winne
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Schubel,  Friedrich,
                        ed.

Greifswalder Beiträge zur Literatur und Stilforschung

                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS

                    were for godes loue I wile ȝou tell þe cas…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:

                    ynne

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Elleuen thousand maydyns clene a faire cumpany it wasHou þei
                    were slayn for goddis lufe I sall ȝou tell þe casA kyng þer
                    was of britayn kyng Maure was hiis nameHe had a doghter þat hyght Vrse
                    a maidyn of nobull fame…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Godd graunte vs for þes mercyis lufe forgyfenes of our
                    synneAnd bryng vs al vn to þat blis þat þes maydens er
                    in

                    were for godes loue ichelle ȝou telle þat cas…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:

                    heie ioie of heuene þat þeos maidens beoþ Inne

…Sory and dreory he was ffor he ne couþe þer of no
                    redffor þe kyng of Engelonde was heþene and alle
                    his…

CamTCC605.First Lines:
Elleuen þousand virgins for godes loue martred wereTelle ic
                    well her marterdom & wo hem þerto gan lere…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…god ous graunte for his grace þat we moten wynneÞe
                    hey Ioie of heuene þat þes maidenes beþ Inne

Elleuen thousand maydens þat faire companye wasYmartred were
                    for goddis loue I wil telle ȝou þe cas…
